com.TwentyCodes.android.location
Class MidPoint

java.lang.Object
  com.TwentyCodes.android.location.MidPoint

public class MidPoint
extends Object

This MidPoint object will hold the information form the calculations performed by GeoUtils.midPoint().

ricky barrette
